tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Operation on a Resource after Expiration or Release in the `Connection::connect_with_fd` and `Connection::connect_with_fd_and_extensions` functions. By supplying a crafted `RawFd`, an attacker can trigger unintended closure of file descriptors, potentially leading to use-after-close conditions, resource mismanagement, or denial of service through repeated closure of already-closed descriptors.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `xcb` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: Operation on a Resource after Expiration or Release
